item: Press 'H' to access the help. (This screen)
Hitting a target will score a hit. The game will end after the 25 shots are used up.
Press 'A' or the left arrow to move the corsshairs left.
Press 'D' or the right arrow to move the crosshairs right.
Press 'W' or the up arrow to move the crosshairs up.
Press 'S' or the down arrow to move the crosshairs down.
The crosshairs will follow the mouse.
Right click to fire the gun.
You will get 2 points for the ducks in the back row. 1 point for other targets.
Based on how well you did, you could win some prizes.
